name: tm27
effect: Teaches Return to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Return to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Fissure)

flavor_text.sun_moon: This full-power attack grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This full-power attack grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
